info.name: Hotel Management
info.description: This collection contains the Web API Assignment Requests.

body.raw:
{
    "Name": "The Fern",
    "Address": "Rajkot",
    "City": "Rajkot",
    "PinCode": "111111",
    "ContactNumber": "0000",
    "ContactPerson": "John",
    "Website": "www.google.com",
    "Facebook": "www.facebook.com",
    "Twitter": "www.twitter.com",
    "IsActive": true,
    "Rooms" : [
        {"Name": "Room 1", "Category": 1, "Price": 600.00, "IsActive": true},
        {"Name": "Room 2", "Category": 1, "Price": 600.00, "IsActive": true},
        {"Name": "Room 3", "Category": 1, "Price": 600.00, "IsActive": true},
        {"Name": "Room 4", "Category": 1, "Price": 600.00, "IsActive": true},
        {"Name": "Room 5", "Category": 2, "Price": 1000.00, "IsActive": true}
    ]
}

request.description:
POST 5-10 hotels with details of hotel and 3-5 rooms in each hotel with different price and different category.

Please browse through the examples of this request for other hotels.

body.raw:
{
    "Name": "Radisson Hotel",
    "Address": "Paris",
    "City": "Paris",
    "PinCode": "111111",
    "ContactNumber": "0000",

request.description:
GET all rooms of hotels with optional parameter by hotel city, pin code, Price, Category. (Default
sort by price of room low to high)

Please browse through the examples to check requests with various parameters.

request.description:
GET availability of room on some particular date (parameter), Response: should be return True
False only
POST Booked the room of hotel for particular date with (optional status)
PUT update booking date for any room by Id
PUT update booking status by booking Id (optional status to Definitive or Cancelled)
DELETE delete booking by booking Id (change status Deleted – soft delete)
